name: Dark Idle
description:
Click, buy upgrades, prestige and finally reincarnation leading to a whole new game within the game. Powdered with some surprising twists.

Remember, you don't have to do a prestige or reincarnation right away if you can.
You can play the levels as long as you want (and not break the infinity wall).

I wish you a lot of fun and look forward to your comments and if you like 'Dark Idle' a positive rating.

Hint:
Saves in browser games aren't really safe.
So please use the 'export game data' function from time to time. 
Most save problems occur because of the browser security settings. I use cookies. So if they are disabled in your browser, save will not work!

Ad:
You can try 'Feed the bunny', my first Itch.IO game too.
It's a bit more 'unusual' but I like it very much. :-)
